data.comment: The match has started.
The match has started.
Mario Melero Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Mallorca.
Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Palma a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Mallorca throw-in in Getafe's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Mallorca territory.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mallorca's half?
Free kick for Mallorca in their own half.
Throw-in for Mallorca in the half of Getafe.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Mallorca in their own half.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Jaime Mata (Getafe) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Mallorca defenders.
Throw-in for Mallorca at Estadi de Son Moix.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Getafe's Robert Kenedy gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Mallorca defender.
Can Getafe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mallorca's half?
Ball safe as Mallorca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mallorca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Mallorca in the half of Getafe.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Getafe throw-in in Mallorca's half.
Mallorca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mallorca drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Palma.
Can Mallorca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
Mallorca have a dangerous throw-in.
Mallorca have a goal kick.
Free kick for Mallorca in their own half.
Mallorca to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
Throw-in Getafe.
Throw-in for Mallorca in the half of Getafe.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Mallorca.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Mallorca throw-in in Getafe's half.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mallorca to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Mallorca in their own half.
Angel Rodriguez (Getafe) has received a yellow card from Mario Melero Lopez.
Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Mallorca.
Getafe attack but Mauro Arambarri's header doesn't find the target.
Mario Melero Lopez awards Mallorca a goal kick.
Free kick for Mallorca in their own half.
Mallorca have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
Goal kick for Getafe at Estadi de Son Moix.
Free kick Getafe.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Mallorca.
Getafe needs to be cautious. Mallorca have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Getafe at Estadi de Son Moix.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Palma Getafe attack through Oghenekaro Etebo. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Palma.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Mallorca in their own half.
Free kick for Mallorca in the half of Getafe.
Mario Melero Lopez awards the away team a throw-in.
The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Estadi de Son Moix.
Throw-in Mallorca.
Goal kick for Getafe at Estadi de Son Moix.
Mallorca advance rapidly upfield but Mario Melero Lopez blows for offside.
Mallorca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mallorca push upfield but Mario Melero Lopez quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Mallorca in their own half.
Corner awarded to Mallorca.
At Estadi de Son Moix, Mallorca are penalized for being offside.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Mallorca in their own half.
Free kick for Mallorca in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mallorca's half?
Getafe's Oghenekaro Etebo is on target but unsuccessful.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
Mallorca awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Salva Sevilla with Pablo Chavarria. This is the first substitution made today by Vicente Moreno.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Mallorca in their own half.
In Palma, Mallorca push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Mallorca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mallorca awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Cucho Hernandez.
At Estadi de Son Moix, Xabier Etxeita for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
Cucho Hernandez for Mallorca is back on the field again.
Manolo Reina returns to the field for Mallorca after picking up a slight injury.
Mario Melero Lopez waits before resuming play because Manolo Reina for Mallorca is still down.
Free kick Mallorca.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mallorca's half?
Throw-in for Getafe at Estadi de Son Moix.
Getafe pushes forward through Damian Suarez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Mallorca.
Throw-in for Mallorca in their own half.
Mallorca to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Getafe throw-in in Mallorca's half.
Nemanja Maksimovic scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Mallorca territory.
Deyverson is on a sub for Angel Rodriguez for Getafe.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
Ball goes out of play for a Mallorca goal kick.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cucho Hernandez (Mallorca) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Abdon.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mallorca's half?
Mallorca have a goal kick.
In Palma, Mallorca push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Mallorca.
Mario Melero Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
Aleix Febas is replacing Iddrisu Baba for Mallorca at Estadi de Son Moix.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Amath Ndiaye is replacing Robert Kenedy for the away team.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Getafe throw-in in Mallorca's half.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pablo Chavarria for Mallorca has been booked by Mario Melero Lopez and receives a first yellow card.
Mario Melero Lopez awards Mallorca a goal kick.
Free kick for Mallorca in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Mallorca in their own half.
Getafe's Deyverson has been booked in Palma.
In Palma a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Estadi de Son Moix, Oghenekaro Etebo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Mallorca advance rapidly upfield but Mario Melero Lopez blows for offside.
Ball safe as Mallorca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Palma a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a Getafe throw-in in Mallorca's half.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Mallorca territory.
Throw-in for Mallorca at Estadi de Son Moix.
Mathias Olivera (Getafe) gets a yellow card.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Mallorca.
Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
At Estadi de Son Moix the fourth official shows that 6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Mallorca in Palma.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez awards Mallorca a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Palma.
Throw-in for Mallorca in the half of Getafe.
Mallorca have been awarded a corner by Mario Melero Lopez.
Mallorca push forward at Estadi de Son Moix and Dani Rodriguez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Getafe defence.
Can Mallorca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
Mallorca to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
In Palma Getafe drive forward through Jaime Mata. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a throw-in for Getafe, close to Mallorca's area.
Mallorca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Mallorca.
Mario Melero Lopez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Mario Melero Lopez blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
Pepe Bordalas (Getafe) is making a third substitution, with David Timor replacing Oghenekaro Etebo.
